Description: Dark green glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of Hieroglyphs including (a personal name with) the prenomen of Apries; back-pillar; the lower leg section has broken away.
Curator's comments: Information on this object provided by Jan Moje (FU Berlin)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Apries (personal name composed with)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
